content.prompt: Which of the following best characterizes the goals of Martin Luther King, Jr.?

choices.label: A peaceful separation of Black people into powerful economic and political groups
A peaceful integration of the races in all areas of society
Federal compensation to Black people for past political and legal injustices
A church-centered Black community removed from the oppression of White people
Constant and, if necessary, violent political and social action to achieve long-sought justice

topic.text: 8.10: The African American Civil Rights Movement (1960s)

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
